General.Name: Toung LoongTextile Mfg Co Ltd
General.Description: Toung Loong Textile Mfg.Co.,Ltd. operates as a textile manufacturing company in Taiwan. The company develops and produces air and draw textured, shape control twist, alpha yarn, and air textured covered yarns, as well as functional synthetic yarn dyes and sewing threads. It operates in Vietnam, Mainland China, and internationally. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 31, San Ming Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 220
